item.description:
Come join me at Gabby's in Braintree for dinner, drinks and music or just drinks and music!  I play pop, rock, and alternative originals and I write all of my songs. My music is about having a positive outlook on life. I try to write with the intent of helping people from all walks of life get past their fears and accomplish satisfaction in their lives. If I can reach people through my music, I believe I am helping my fans one by one. 

I will be performing at 9 PM.  The other performer is Steve Dalton www.myspace.com/steveplaysmusic.

The Cubs/Sox game will be on TV at 7PM at Gabby's ....just to let everyone know!

 

Gabby's offers a wide variety of beer and wine and also has Italian, Argentinian, and American dishes. Try their Empanadas or famous pork chops or just a pizza!  www.gabbysrestaurantandlounge.com

Feel free to check out my music on my website at:www.jodigriffith.com

Peace! Jodi
item.how_to_find_us: I will be by the stage with a meet-up sign
item.name: Dinner, Drinks, and Music at Gabby's in Braintree
